Class Team<T extends Participant>

java.lang.Object
game.Team<T>
Type Parameters:
T - The type of participants in the team, which extends Participant.
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, Cloneable
public class Team<T extends Participant> extends Object implements Serializable, Cloneable
The Team class represents a team of participants of a specific type.
See Also:
